author: craigmcc
msg: Release the "value" attribute in the release() method.

author: craigmcc
msg: Add a new "toScope" attribute to the <bean:define> tag, so that you can
declare which scope (page, request, session, or application) the new bean
should be created in.  This lives up to the promise of the Bean Tag
Developer's Guide, which says you can use the "scope" attribute for this.
In reality, the "scope" attribute identifies the scope of the bean you are

author: craigmcc
msg: Add 'type="text/javascript"' to the generated code for setting field focus,
so that HTML/4.01 validators will not complain.

author: craigmcc
msg: If there are no application message resources, display an error message string
instead of totally ignoring the ActionErrors object created by the user.

author: craigmcc
msg: Add a deprecation warning that suggests people doing new development
